name: Samaayu Welpenela Porridge
description: Welpenela, Welpenela (Cardiospermum halicacabum), having its goodness hidden among Ola leaf writings of Ayurveda, brings sparkle, vitality and joie de vivre needed to live life to its fullest. brings sparkle and vitality needed to live life to its fullest. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
